name: Kensel & Co.
description: Kensel & Co is a financial advisory firm
tag_list: investment-banking, media, marketing, technology, digital-media, venture-capital, private-equity, mergers, acquisitions, funding, advice
overview:
Kensel & Co. is an advisory firm that partners with high-growth companies and private equity firms to provide merger and acquisition, strategic planning and corporate development services. The firm partners with growth companies to provide corporate finance and M&A services, and private equity firms to lead acquisition searches, due diligence, and secondary transactions. Kensel & Co. has particular expertise within the media, marketing, and technology industries.

Kensel & Co. is led by successful entrepreneurs and operators which enable us to understand the challenges of growth companies and offer deep financial and operating knowledge, merger and acquisition experience, and a strong network of industry relationships. Our firm focuses on lower to middle-market companies within industries where technology and business innovation are the driving catalysts for growth.

Kensel & Co. also makes direct investments in certain growth companies where our expertise, capital, and strategic resources can accelerate business growth.
